title: Bryan Cranston
summary: Bryan Lee Cranston (born March 7, 1956) is an American actor, director, producer, and screenwriter. He is best known for his roles as Hal in the Fox sitcom Malcolm in the Middle (2000–2006), Walter White in the AMC crime drama series Breaking Bad (2008–2013), and Dr. Tim Whatley in the NBC sitcom Seinfeld (1994–1997).
